question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: Who was Toby Foster's spouse before 2010?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1:
Title: The Unlikely Union: Toby Foster and Arabella Laing's Enduring Bond

In the realm of British peerage, where lineage and legacy reign supreme, a quiet yet remarkable union has stood the test of time. Toby Foster, a scion of a respected noble family, and Arabella Laing, a woman of elegance and poise, have defied convention to forge a lasting marriage that has captivated the imagination of those who know them. As we delve into the lives of these two individuals, it becomes clear that their paths were destined to cross. Toby Foster, with his Peerage person ID of 555366, hails from a long line of distinguished nobles, his family's history woven into the very fabric of British society. Arabella Laing, born in 1960, brings a sense of modernity and sophistication to the table, her own family's roots steeped in tradition and refinement. The evidence of their marriage is not simply a matter of public record; it is a testament to the power of love and commitment. Those who have had the privilege of witnessing their relationship firsthand speak of a deep and abiding connection, one that transcends the boundaries of social class and expectation. One need only look to the early days of their courtship to understand the foundation upon which their marriage was built. It was a time of whirlwind romance, with Toby and Arabella swept up in a maelstrom of passion and excitement. Friends and family members recall the way they would gaze into each other's eyes, their love radiating like a beacon in the darkness. As their relationship blossomed, the couple's differences became apparent. Toby, with his noble heritage, was accustomed to a life of privilege and luxury. Arabella, on the other hand, brought a sense of humility and groundedness to the table. Yet, it was precisely these differences that drew them closer together, each complementing the other in a beautiful dance of contrasts. The evidence of their marriage is not limited to the testimony of those who know them. Public records, too, bear witness to their union. From the official documentation of their wedding ceremony to the countless social events and charitable functions they have attended together, the trail of evidence is clear: Toby Foster and Arabella Laing are, indeed, husband and wife. But their marriage is more than just a collection of facts and figures.
content.source_2: October 17, 2030, was a crisp autumn day in Stockholm, Sweden. The leaves had just begun to turn, casting a warm golden glow over the city. It was a day that Toby Foster, a member of the esteemed Peerage family, would never forget. For on this day, he would embark on a new chapter in his life, one that would be filled with love, laughter, and a dash of cinematic flair. Toby, a dashing young man with a quick wit and a charming smile, had met Marie-Louise Ekman, a renowned Swedish film director, at a charity gala several months prior. It was a chance encounter that would change the course of their lives forever. As they locked eyes across the crowded room, Toby was immediately drawn to Marie-Louise's fiery spirit and creative energy. Their whirlwind romance took them from the picturesque canals of Stockholm to the sun-kissed beaches of the French Riviera. As they explored the world together, Toby and Marie-Louise discovered that they shared a passion for art, music, and, above all, storytelling. It was only natural, then, that their love would culminate in a union that would bring together their two worlds. On the morning of October 17, Toby woke up early, feeling like a kid on Christmas morning. He couldn't wait to make Marie-Louise his wife. As he got dressed, he glanced out the window, taking in the breathtaking view of the city. The sky was a brilliant blue, with just a hint of cloud cover â€“ a perfect omen for the day ahead. Meanwhile, Marie-Louise was busy getting ready at her own residence, surrounded by her closest friends and family. Her hair was styled to perfection, and her makeup was subtle yet elegant. She slipped into her stunning white gown, designed by a famous Swedish couturier, and felt like a true princess. As the clock struck 11 am, Toby made his way to the beautiful Storkyrkan, a 13th-century church in the heart of Stockholm's Old Town. The guests were already seated, chatting excitedly among themselves. Toby's heart skipped a beat as he caught sight of Marie-Louise walking down the aisle, her father by her side. The ceremony was a beautiful blend of traditional Swedish customs and modern flair, reflecting the couple's eclectic tastes.
